title: "Skyscraper Data"
# Buildings in each city
```{r}
tallestbuildings %>%
  group_by(City) %>%
  summarise(Building_count = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(Building_count))
```

# Plot Cities by mean height of buildings 
```{r}
ggplot(tallestbuildings, aes(City, Height..ft.) + geom_bar()
```
